riskModels.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • riskModels.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    This is bean class to set and get properties of player.

    akshay shah

      • reinforce

        public void reinforce(java.lang.String country,
                      riskView.GameView gameView)
        Handles placing reinforcements.
        Parameters:
        country - is a String of the country in which the reinforcements will be placed
        gameView - has the details to load the game board

      • attack

        public void attack(java.lang.String country1,
                   java.lang.String country2,
                   riskView.GameView gameView)
        Handles the attack function. Attacking allows the player to engage in battles, with outcomes decided by RNG, with opposing players in order to lower the number of armies in a territory to 0 in order to occupy it.
        Parameters:
        country1 - is a String of the point A country.
        country2 - is a String of the point B country.
        gameView - has the details to load game board

      • fortify

        public void fortify(java.lang.String country1,
                    java.lang.String country2,
                    riskView.GameView gameView,
                    Player model)
        Handles the fortify function. Fortifying allows the player to move armies from one country to another occupied country once per turn.
        Parameters:
        country1 - is a String of the point A country.
        country2 - is a String of the point B country.
        gameView - has the details to load the game board
        model - player object

      • turnInCards

        public void turnInCards(int[] cardsToRemove)
        Handles turning in Risk cards.
        Parameters:
        cardsToRemove - is an integer array of the indexes of cards to be removed.

      • checkHasCountryCaptured

        public void checkHasCountryCaptured()
        This will assign the Card if attacker has captured atleast one country in the attack phase based upon the hasCountryCaptured variable boolean

      • endPlayerTurn

        public void endPlayerTurn(Player model)
        This will end the player's turn and assign the card if player decided to skip Foritification phase.
        Parameters:
        model - Player.class

      • moveArmyFromTo

        public void moveArmyFromTo(riskModels.country.Country countryA,
                           riskModels.country.Country countryB,
                           int armies)
        Move the army from one country to another. Usually is called when fortification phase
        Parameters:
        countryA - Country from which army is to be moved
        countryB - Country to which army is to be added
        armies - the number of armies to allocate

      • getMaxNumberOfDicesForDefender

        public int getMaxNumberOfDicesForDefender(riskModels.country.Country country)
        gets the max number of dices for defender country based upon the no. of armies present in the country at that time
        Parameters:
        country - Defender's defending country
        Returns:
        total number of dices to be used

      • getMaxNumberOfDices

        public int getMaxNumberOfDices(riskModels.country.Country country)
        Return the maximum number of dices which can be rolled during an attack phase for the country selected.
        Parameters:
        country - Country object to calculate the number of dice according to the armies in it.
        Returns:
        max number of dices which can be rolled.

      • nextPlayerTurn

        public void nextPlayerTurn(Player model)
        Reset all the boolean values and set currentPlayer value to next player. It will also calculate the total reinforcement armies needed.
        Parameters:
        model - Player.class object to passed for Card View Observable
